words.source: H3372 Qal wayyiqtol 3fp; KJV 'But the midwives feared', ESV 'But the midwives feared', NASB 'But the midwives feared' — all agree
H3205 article + Piel participle fem pl abs; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the midwives'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H430 article + noun masc pl abs (majestic plural); KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God' — all agree
H3808 conj + negative particle; KJV 'and did not', ESV 'and did not', NASB 'and did not' — all agree
H6213 Qal perf 3cp; KJV 'did not…as', ESV 'do…as', NASB 'do…as' — all agree
H834 prep + relative particle; KJV 'as', ESV 'as', NASB 'as' — all agree
H1696 Piel perf 3ms; KJV 'commanded them', ESV 'the king…commanded them', NASB 'the king…had commanded them' — all convey the king's command
H413 prep + 3fp suffix; KJV 'unto them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them' — all agree
H4428 noun masc sg cstr; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the king of'
H2421 Piel wayyiqtol 3fp; KJV 'saved…alive', ESV 'let…live', NASB 'let…live' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses 'saved alive'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3206 article + noun masc pl abs; KJV 'the men children', ESV 'the male children', NASB 'the boys' — all refer to male infants
